# CAM::SET_CAM_FOV

## Summary
Set the camera's field of view (in degrees.)

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** camera
* **FLOAT** fov

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the field of view of the cam.
---------------------------------------------
Min: 1.0f
Max: 130.0f
